full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Ophthalmologist Consultant Services**
===========================================================

**Introduction**
---------------

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) invites proposals for Ophthalmologist Consultant Services to support the Non-Insured Health Benefit (NIHB) Program for the Medical Supplies and Equipment (MSE) Review Centre. The successful contractor will provide specialist medical services on an as-and-when-required basis for a period of three years, with potential extensions of one year each.

**Objective**
------------

The NIHB Program requires the expertise of a qualified Ophthalmologist to evaluate requests for vision care benefits, providing timely recommendations for approval or denial, and offering professional advice on specific cases and program policies.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The contractor will:

* Provide recommendations within a specified deadline for case approvals or denials
* Offer professional advice on specific cases to NIHB staff
* Contribute to the development of program policies and guidelines for NIHB staff

**Security Requirements**
------------------------

The contractor and all authorized personnel must hold a valid Government of Canada personnel Security Screening at the Reliability Status level during the contract period.

**Estimated Level of Effort**
---------------------------

The estimated level of effort for the initial contract period is 81 hours. The option periods will require an estimated 27 hours each.

**Instruction for Accessing the Request for Proposal (RFP) Document**
----------------------------------------------------------------

* The complete RFP package, including the tender attachment, is available on the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41437/1000254915_rfp_en.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41437/1000254915_rfp_fr.pdf (French).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Karen Mezher at karen.mezher@sac-isc.gc.ca or (873) 354-8200.

**Key Dates**
-------------

* Tender closing date: 2024-07-22T14:00:00
* RFP and tender information: 2024-07-02

**Number of Proposals**
------------------------

One (1) contractor will be selected to provide Ophthalmologist Consultant Services for the NIHB Program.
